description: Data was loaded from the extensive characterization of probes on the Infinium HumanMethylation450 microarray, in September 2018. The data is based on the file http://zwdzwd.io/InfiniumAnnotation/20180909/hm450/hm450.hg38.manifest.gencode.v22.tsv.gz. Note that column "gene_HGNC", which in the original table contains a semi-colon delimited string, has been denormalized in this table, so that each row includes a reference to only one gene, and methylation probes that are in/near multiple genes will have some information repeated on multiple rows. More details: see Zhou W, Laird PW and Shen H, Comprehensive characterization, annotation and innovative use of Infinium DNA Methylation BeadChip probes, Nucleic Acids Research 2017 https://academic.oup.com/nar/article/45/4/e22/2290930. This table is hosted with the permission of the authors.

fields.description: CpG genomic coordinate: chromosome, e.g., chr1, chrX, etc (can be blank)
fields.name: CpG_chrm

fields.description: CpG genomic coordinate: start position (can be blank)
fields.name: CpG_beg

fields.description: CpG genomic coordinate: end position (can be blank)
fields.name: CpG_end

fields.description: CpG genomic coordinate: + or -for forward or reverse strand (can be blank)
fields.name: probe_strand

fields.description: Gene name, e.g., TTN, DDR1, etc. (can be blank)See https://m.ensembl.org/info/genome/genebuild/gene_names.html
fields.name: gene_name

fields.description: Transcript type, e.g., protein_coding, antisense, lincRNA, etc (can be blank)
fields.name: transcript_type

fields.description: Ensembl transcript ID. Stable IDs are created in the form ENS[species prefix][feature type prefix][a unique eleven digit number]. For example, a mouse transcript might be ENSMUST###########. For human, there is no species code, so IDs are in the form ENS(object type)(identifier).(version). E.g., ENST00000409483.4 (can be blank).See https://useast.ensembl.org/Help/Faq?id=488
fields.name: transcriptID

fields.description: Distance from CpG to TSS (range is between -1501 and >1MB)
fields.name: dist_to_TSS

fields.description: CpG Island regions were defined based on UCSC criteria : CG content >50%, Obs/Exp, CpG ratio >0.60 and length >200 bps.Shores were defined as the 2 kb up- and down-stream of a CpG island and shelves as the 2 kb outside of a shore (including N shelf, N shore, CpG Island, S shelf and S shore of CpG region)
fields.name: CGI_region

fields.description: CpG Island name/location. Example: CGI:chr18:55587822-55588464 (can be blank)
fields.name: CGI

fields.description: CpG Island start position (parsed from CGI field, can be blank)
fields.name: CGI_beg

fields.description: CpG Island end position (parsed from CGI field, can be blank)
fields.name: CGI_end
